Plot: In order to prevent the Tannen crime family from taking over Hill Valley, Marty must return to 1931 and get Kid Tannen arrested.
Title: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2, Get Tannen
Writer: Bob Gale (characters), Bob Gale (story), Andy Hartzell, Robert Zemeckis (characters)
Actors: A.J. LoCascio, Christopher Lloyd, Andrew Chaikin, Roger Jackson
